review_title: A rather flat organization that encourages thinking out of the box!
job_title: Member of Management Team in Silang, Province of Cavite
pros: IIRR is less hierarchical. You can readily communicate and freely discuss with your supervisor. A nice place for people who are creative and think out of the box as programs evolved from felt needs of the communities and strategies are learned with local partners.
cons: Like any other not for profit organizations, funding is dependent on programs and projects which is very challenging and has implications to program continuity
